nodes.text: The soldier Hazram Namir led a band of soldiers on the planet Crucival. This included Pira Ten, who Namir befriended while part of the Opaline Creed, and Tar and Mishru, men who Namir fought against before their masters were lost. In 0 BBY, the band was recruited by the Galactic Empire to help defend their tower from the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry. However, nearly all of them died in the first wave of the battle. By the end of the fighting, only Namir survived.
Hazram Namir's band first appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
